meanings.definition: Resembling a tulip in shape or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The colorful flower was tuliplike with its elegant petals.
meanings.sent2: She wore a tuliplike dress to the spring party.
meanings.sent3: The tuliplike lampshade added a touch of whimsy to the room.
meanings.sent4: Her smile bloomed tuliplike, brightening up the entire room.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted a tuliplike landscape that captured the beauty of spring.
